info.name: Flickr - Archives - Display FAVS ICON
info.description:
Display the Fav icons on "Archives by date taken" .
Work for all type of Thumbnail View , except for the Square View (If you find how to display it here , you can explain to me...)
Test link (Small Thumbnail):
http://www.flickr.com/photos/8001694@N05/archives/date-taken/?view=sm
This style is added into my : Flickr WideScreen - Wide ARCHIVES (http://userstyles.org/styles/48503/)

It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection".

BUT NOW you can have all the collection (Updated) in one:
Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE (http://userstyles.org/styles/52247/)
